,"type":"uint256"}],"name":"transferCommitments","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"CapSign Inc.","details":"Token-based ownership model - ownership is determined by membership token balances.      Flow:      1. Fund is initialized with a membership token (issued via Offering)      2. Admin creates capital calls specifying total amount and due date      3. Commitments are calculated based on token ownership snapshot      4. Members contribute (on-chain or off-chain)      5. Distributions are handled by TokenDistributionFacet (separate)      This facet is suitable for:      - PE/VC funds with commitment-based subscriptions      - Real estate funds with capital calls      - Any fund structure with drawdown mechanics","errors":{"AccessControl_CallerIsNotAuthorized(address,bytes4)":[{"params":{"caller":"Address attempting the call","functionSig":"Function selector that (zero)"}],"CapitalCall_InvalidDueDate()":[{"details":"Invalid due date (must be in future)"}],"CapitalCall_InvalidMember()":[{"details":"Invalid member address"}],"CapitalCall_NoCommitment()":[{"details":"Member has no commitment for this call"}],"CapitalCall_NoMembershipToken()":[{"details":"Membership token not cancelCapitalCall(uint256).details: Only admin can cancel. Does not refund on-chain contributions.

contributeToCall(uint256,uint256).details: Member calls this with tokens to fulfill their commitment

createCapitalCall(uint256,uint256,bytes3.details: Snapshots current token ownership to calculate commitments

params.dueDate: Unix timestamp when contributions are due
params.members: Array of member addresses to include in the call
params.purposeHash: IPFS hash or keccak256 of purpose description

returns.funded: True if total received >= total amount

packedSelectors().details: Each selector is 4 bytes, packed sequentially with no padding      MUST NOT include packedSelectors() itself in the returned selectors      MUST be a pure function (no state access)

recordOffchainContribution(uint256,addre.details: Admin records contribution without token transfer

transferCommitments(address,address,uint.details: Called by CapitalCallComplianceModule after token transfer

getCallCommitments(uint256).notice: Get all commitments for a capital call

getCapitalCallCount().notice: Get number of capital calls created

getCommitment(uint256,address).notice: Get member's commitment for a capital call

getMemberTotalContributed(address).notice: Get total capital contributed by a member across all calls

getPaymentToken().notice: Get the default payment token address

isCallFunded(uint256).notice: Check if a capital call is fully funded

isCapitalCallInitialized().notice: Check if capital call facet is initialized

packedSelectors().notice: Returns all function selectors for this facet as tightly packed bytes

recordOffchainContribution(uint256,addre.notice: Record an off-chain contribution (wire transfer, etc.)

setComplianceModule(address).notice: Set the compliance module that can call transferCommitments

transferCommitments(address,address,uint.notice: Transfer capital call commitments when membership tokens transfer
